text: Hubert Lucot (1935 – 18 January 2017) was a French poet and metafiction writer. The son of director , he was the author of over 60 books. == Biography == Hubert Lucot was born in 1935 in Paris. Lucot began his career as a poet. In the 1960s, he took up prose, especially metafiction. Over the course of his career, he published over 60 books.
